mapper.select: SELECT c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, u.id as u_id, u.source_id as u_source_id, u.auth_source as u_auth_source, u.login as u_login, u.token as u_token FROM channels c LEFT JOIN user_channel uc ON c.id=uc.channel_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=uc.user_id WHERE c.id=#{1}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_channel WHERE user_id=#{user.id} AND channel_id=#{channel_id}
